# The movement to the iron ore position was successful. Now that I am close enough, I will attempt to place the stone furnace again.

furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=iron_position.x, y=iron_position.y))  # Place the furnace
print(f'Placed furnace at position: {furnace.position}')  # Confirm furnace placement
